item.title: DJI couldn’t confirm or deny it disguised this drone to evade a US ban
item.description: DJI barely sells drones in the United States anymore. The shelves are bare; resellers are jacking up prices. It appears an unofficial ban at US customs is to blame. But on Amazon, you can now buy a dr
